headline: Does Zimmer Biomet’s Raised Guidance and Lower Tariff Headwinds Strengthen the Bull Case for ZBH?
summary: Zimmer Biomet reported better-than-expected Q2 2025 results, with revenues of US$2.08 billion and adjusted EPS of US$2.07, leading management to raise full-year forecasted adjusted EPS to US$8.10–US$8.30 and reduce its anticipated tariff headwinds to about US$40 million. Industry analysts pointed to the company's reduced tariff impact and upwardly revised guidance as factors that set Zimmer Biomet apart among peers in a strong quarter for surgical equipment and consumables. We'll examine how...
